languages.text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда кто-либо из союзников {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g} завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, впервые совершив в бою {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, мастер-тактик немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с {uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и полным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

The Tactician immediately gains an extra turn with <u>(the Tactician's FEL Bonus)/2</u> Action Points and full Movement Points after the Tactician's ally uses Heroic Act very first time in a combat and finishes their the turn.

The Tactician immediately gains an extra turn with <u>(the Tactician's FEL Bonus)/2</u> action points and full movement points the first time any of the Tactician's allies use heroic act in a combat and finishes their turn.

Master Tactician's gains +5 Fellowship whenever an ally uses a Heroic Act. Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness whenever an ally uses a Desperate Measure. This bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. This bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. This bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. This bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. This bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда союзник совершает героический акт, мастер-тактик получает +5 к Общительности. Когда союзник прибегает к отчаянным мерам, мастер-тактик получает +5 к Выносливости. Эти бонусы суммируются и сохраняются до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The Tactician immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with <u>(the Tactician's FEL {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})/2</u> action points and full movement points the first time any of the Tactician's allies use heroic act in a combat and finishes their turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда кто-либо из союзников тактика завершает ход, впервые совершив в бою героический акт, тактик немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика / 2)</u> ОД и полным запасом ОП.

Когда кто-либо из союзников тактика завершает ход, впервые совершив в бою героический акт, тактик немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика / 2)</u> ОД и полным запасом ОП.

Когда кто-либо из союзников тактика завершает ход, впервые совершив в бою героический акт, тактик немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} вместе с {uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59} ОД и полным запасом ОП.

languages.text: 每当战术专家的盟友使用英雄壮举时，战术专家都会获得+5社交。每当战术专家的盟友使用背水一战时，战术专家都会获得+5坚韧。上述加成效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当战术专家的盟友使用英雄壮举时，战术专家都会获得+5社交。每当战术专家的盟友使用背水一战时，战术专家都会获得+5坚韧。上述加成效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。

当战术专家的任意盟友首次在战斗中使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}并结束回合时，战术专家立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此额外回合中，战术专家获得{uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59}点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，以及全额{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que los aliados del maestro táctico usan un acto heroico, el maestro táctico gana +5 de Empatía. Cada vez que sus aliados usan una medida desesperada, el maestro táctico gana +5 de Resistencia. Estas bonificaciones se acumulan hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los aliados del maestro táctico usan un acto heroico, el maestro táctico gana +5 de Empatía. Cada vez que sus aliados usan una medida desesperada, el maestro táctico gana +5 de Resistencia. Estas bonificaciones se acumulan hasta el final del combate.

El táctico gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con {uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} y todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} la primera vez que cualquiera de sus aliados realice un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} en un combate y luego termine su turno.

languages.text: Wenn der Verbündete des Meistertaktikers eine Heldentat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Gefolgschaft. Wenn sein Verbündeter eine Verzweiflungstat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Zähigkeit. Diese Boni können gestapelt werden und haben bis zum Ende des Kampfs Bestand.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Verbündete des Meistertaktikers eine Heldentat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Gefolgschaft. Wenn sein Verbündeter eine Verzweiflungstat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Zähigkeit. Diese Boni können gestapelt werden und haben bis zum Ende des Kampfs Bestand.

Der Taktiker erhält sofort eine {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzrunde{/g} mit {uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkten{/g} und vollen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkten{/g}, wenn ein beliebiger seiner Verbündeten in einem Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt und seine Runde beendet.

Wenn der Verbündete des Meistertaktikers eine Heldentat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Gefolgschaft. Wenn sein Verbündeter eine Verzweiflungstat einsetzt, erhält der Meistertaktiker +5 Zähigkeit. Diese Boni können gestapelt werden und haben bis zum Ende des Kampfs Bestand.

languages.text: Le maître tacticien gagne +5 points de Fraternité chaque fois qu'un allié se livre à un acte héroïque et +5 points de Résistance chaque fois que son allié a recours à une mesure désespérée. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Le maître tacticien gagne +5 points de Fraternité chaque fois qu'un allié se livre à un acte héroïque et +5 points de Résistance chaque fois que son allié a recours à une mesure désespérée. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.

Le Tacticien bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec {uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} et le nombre maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} la première fois qu'un de ses alliés accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au combat et termine son tour.

Le maître tacticien gagne +5 points de Fraternité chaque fois qu'un allié se livre à un acte héroïque et +5 points de Résistance chaque fois que son allié a recours à une mesure désespérée. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 戦略の達人の味方がその戦闘で英雄的行為を使用するたび、戦略の達人は連帯を5獲得する。さらに味方が非常手段を使用するたび、戦略の達人が耐久力を5獲得する。このボーナスはスタックして、戦闘終了時まで続く。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Master Tactician's ally uses a heroic act, the Master Tactician gains +5 Fellowship. Whenever their ally uses a desperate measure, the Master Tactician gains +5 Toughness. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦略の達人の味方がその戦闘で英雄的行為を使用するたび、戦略の達人は連帯を5獲得する。さらに味方が非常手段を使用するたび、戦略の達人が耐久力を5獲得する。このボーナスはスタックして、戦闘終了時まで続く。

戦術家の味方がその戦闘で初めて{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用し、そのターンを終えた時、戦術家は即座に{uip|ActionPoints|9ca8068e5dbb4d2ca3fc79cbe181ce59}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}と、完全な{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を持った状態で{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。
